full_summary:
# [SAS License Bundle Renewal for FY 2023-2024](#sas-license-bundle-renewal-for-fy-2023-2024)

* **Contract Reference Number:** SSC-23-00022420:T
* **Publication Date:** March 24th, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 31st, 2023 by 12:00 PM EST
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GSDS)
* **Trade Agreements:** Applicable to suppliers that are registered under the following trade agreements: 
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Atlantic Procurement Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region, with national delivery
* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Kyle Hnatyshin
	+ Phone: 613-614-1493
	+ Fax: 613-614-1493
	+ Email: [kyle.hnatyshin@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:kyle.hnatyshin@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
	+ Address: SSC Kent Street, 180 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON K1G 4A8

## Related Documents

You can download the supporting documents for this tender on the Shared Services Canada website: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/23EA51C3-4CCD-427F-A791-2F217595E23A](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/23EA51C3-4CCD-427F-A791-2F217595E23A)

Note: This is a request for proposal and is open to all qualified suppliers. The procurement method is competitive open bidding. The contact information for the contracting entity and the end-user entity is the same. The notice URL is not available. The related documents
